entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Whitby
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:42 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Precipitation, 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Oshawa Executive Airport 11:02 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

Temperature: 1.3°C

Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 98 %

entry.title: Saturday: Rain showers or flurries. High 7.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain showers near noon. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
